attributes.action: let fathers pay what they can afford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like to be able to pay what we can afford and not be told that we have to pay what the govement thinks is right when some of us are on low wages.
Also if the father is paying we should have acess to the childern and this should be enforced through the courts.
If you have arrears we should be able to pay what we can afford and take longer than the two years the GOVERMENT say we have.
